content: this is a summary of a legal case involving two parties the case has reached the higher court in ljubljana and a decision was made on june 13 2022 the case is about a legal procedure regarding costs in a court case specifically a compensation claim the case involves a dispute over investment money used for construction work on a commercial and residential building the court of appeal has made a judgment dividing it with 62 in favor of one party and 38 in favor of the other party the judgment is now being adjusted and there are four further steps to be taken the court emphasizes the importance of considering the efforts and contributions made by each partner in the acquisition of the property the appeal in this case was dismissed and the defendant is ordered to bear the costs of the appeal proceedings the court of appeal has found reason to doubt the credibility of a witness and has accepted an appeal in a dispute over the division of coowned property the court will consider the income and contributions of both parties as well as the circumstances surrounding their contributions the court of appeal dismissed the appeal made by the applicant and upheld the judgment made by the lower court

metadata.CASE_ID: Sodba Višjega sodišča v Ljubljani II Cp 761/2022, 13. 6. 2022
